title: How to get genuine data entry projects - Quora

response.answer_text: You cant. Do not even try it. all are scams in data entry category nowadays. companies do not hire such simple jobs anymore. majority tasks are done inhouse operations only. People who think they can still get data entry kind of thing and earn money in this digital era, fall for scam offers and waste their investment and time . Instead, use your brain, think practical. Start Outbound call center business Online business, like buy and sell, Lead generation are booming nowadays. Actually its long time these business doing good, thanks to technology , we see this and notice a lot now. I would suggest Virtual call center business good option in this digital era.. One can start from home or anywhere . with proper investment in databasse lists ( approx. 1.5Lac inr to 2 Lac INR ) , you can start such business anywhere and earn good profits . Many people doing from long time, be a part of winning side, do not fall for easy money offers. to earn money online, you must understand few basics.. You never earn any if you are one of those who think their Typing is skill and they can earn by that. Typing is skills no doubt, but not to earn money sure. Many people think, online jobs means typing or copy paste something and earn money for that , Sure , wake up dear, not gonna happen. Second, when you willing to earn online, you must do some work , and for that you must invest money to purchase basic resources. Only computer and internet connection are not enough to get started. Its only basic things, you must need more to get job done. For Genuine reference, guidance , long term projects you may check Saleem Shaik's answer to How can I work from home? Saleem Shaik's answer to How do I get a contract for a call center I own? Feel free to communicate if you are serious about work and investment accordingly. please do not bother, if you are free stuff seeker. Thank you regards Gurcharan Sing

Dear Abhishekh you can try some best websites likeFreelancer.comFiverr.comI will suggest you fiverr.com because fiverr will give you your first project in less then 1 week yes I tried this platform and in first week I got 5 projects and I have earn 35 USD from them but the one problem with it is payment . Payment time is soo much late after you complete an project you have to Waite at least 14 days to be payment released that's a problem but this platform is best then any other websites soo you can try this now.
